metadata.name: Powershell LocalAccount Manipulation
metadata.comment: Adversaries may manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems. Account manipulation may consist of any action that preserves adversary access to a compromised account, such as modifying credentials or permission groups

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('disable-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('enable-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('new-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rename-localuser')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-localuser')))

output.summary: Adversaries may manipulate accounts to maintain access to victim systems. Account manipulation may consist of any action that preserves adversary access to a compromised account, such as modifying credentials or permission groups

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administrative script References: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1098/T1098.md#atomic-test-1---admin-account-manipulate, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.localaccounts/?view=powershell-5.1
